user_request: Clear the cart on walmart. Add usb-b to the cart on walmart
last_action: click on the cancel button located at the top right.
reflect_result:
By clicking the cancel button located at the top right of the screen, the action dismissed the current overlay or pop-up (likely the promotional offer or app advertisement). This action did not directly impact the cart, so the cart remains unchanged.

To move closer to the user request of clearing the cart, additional steps are needed. Specifically, the user should go to the cart and remove the existing items.

This action helps by decluttering the screen and may bring the user closer to managing the cart but does not yet clear it. More actions are needed to clear the cart and then add a USB-B to it.
